data.title: Trade Shows & Events
data.text:
Join us on June 9th and June 10th and register now for the free webinar! Webinar attendees can qualify for a special offer from LAP.

Precast concrete parts factories worldwide face the challenge how to increase output and cut costs while keeping up the high quality of their products. In this webinar, we will adress how laser projection systems from LAP can be used to greatly save set-up times and thus boost efficiency in precast concrete parts production. Register here:

A powerful product that meets all legal requirements: biocide-free cooling lubricants by Oemeta at EMO

Oemeta Chemische Werke GmbH is appearing at EMO to present NOVAMET 920, a new and improved version of an already successful product. The high-performing, water-miscible cooling lubricant is produced from innovative modern ingredients and is free of biocides and formaldehyde. As a result, the manufacturer can guarantee excellent contaminant removal and outstanding results...

• Growth of quick-clamping technology particularly strong in the rubber industry

Hilchenbach, July 17, 2019. The company Römheld Rivi GmbH, specialists in magnetic clamping technology, is presenting its new service network for Europe, the USA and Asia at the K 2019 trade fair. The network comprises 15 service points throughout Europe, and one each in the USA, China and Japan. The service points will provide support for customers in North America and ...

Walter is celebrating the centenary of its foundation today with some 150 guests from the worlds of business and politics.

Walter AG, a provider of specialized machining solutions based in Tübingen, Germany, is celebrating the centenary of its foundation today with some 150 guests from the worlds of business and politics.

The largest Mining & Quarrying Event for the Middle East, Africa, Central & South Asia

We present our complete range of radio remote controls and show you how easy it is to convert your machines. From construction machinery to tunneling - the possibilities of controlling machines by radio remote control are enormous. The requirements increase for the safe control of machines. In particular, moving machines, large machines with danger zones must be mane...

MISUMI Academy

The MISUMI Academy is a Germany-wide offering of MISUMI Europa GmbH, the global manufacturer of over 12 million configurable components, standard components and indirect materials. The programme is aimed at technical educational institutions, such as vocational schools, colleges or technical schools. MISUMI offers a variety of useful tools and offerings for teachers and ...

We will be exhibiting at the SMM fair in Hamburg from 3 to 6 September! Discover the latest news on the portable line borers of the series Supercombinata

Why attend the SMM Hamburg? The SMM trade fair in Hamburg is the world's leading event for the maritime industry, bringing together more than 2,200 exhibitors and tens of thousands of visitors from all over the world. It is a unique opportunity to discover the latest innovations, network with industry leaders and find cutting-edge solutions to improve your operations. ...

CSP impresses trade visitors with innovative quality assurance solutions

Schraubtec is one of the most important trade fairs for the screwdriving technology sector in Germany. This year, CSP GmbH & Co. KG was once again represented as an exhibitor and was able to present its latest quality assurance solutions to a broad specialist audience. The Schraubtec in Hamburg was a complete success for CSP. Our stand was well attended and we had many ...

Last week, we had the pleasure of exhibiting at Schraubtec in Sindelfingen, a leading trade fair for screwdriving technology and innovation. With an impressive 77 exhibitors, over 900 interested visitors and a wide range of specialist presentations, the event was a highlight for the industry.

As well as showcasing our own products and solutions, Schraubtec was also an invaluable networking opportunity. We had the opportunity to make contact with representatives from other companies, technical experts and potential customers. These discussions not only allowed us to share experiences and best practices, but also opened up new business opportunities and collabo...

Booth N° 9008

PROTEM & SERCO, along with their Canadian partner EG Machinery Canada Inc., will enjoy to talk about your projects at FABTECH Canada 2024, June 11-13, Toronto Congress Centre (South Building). You are welcome to visit us at our booth #9008. Feel free to schedule a personal meeting with us at contact@protemusa.com and give us the date and the time which suit you best. ...

Booth G32 - Hall 6

From June 3rd to 7th we will attend the 32nd edition of the BIEMH in Bilbao, the international reference fair for machine tools and advanced manufacturing in Spain. Visit us at our booth G32 - Hall 6 to test and discover the many advantages of our solutions for industrial assembly, from the latest manual to semi-automatic and automatic innovations. Innovative technolog...

Advanced Solutions for Environmental Challenges

Fibre Net Group, a specialist in the development of certified products and systems in fiber-reinforced composites with 100% Italian production, will be exhibiting at IFAT, the biennial international trade fair for environmental technologies, from May 13th to 17th, 2024, at the Munich Trade Fair Centre. FIBRE NET GROUP Booth No. 344 Hall B2

From 14 to 17 May 2024 we will be exhibiting at the exhibition Elmia Machine Tools in Jönköping, which is one of the most important industry events in Sweden.

What you will find on our stand You will discover the best-selling models of our mobile line borers, which have been specially developed to meet the requirements of the machine tool industry. We will be exhibiting the Supercombinata SC3, designed for the toughest applications and equipped with the most powerful motor of the range. It enables boring and overlay welding op...

APE 2024 Exhibition On FM-30

Innovacera will attend ASIA PHOTONICS EXPO on March 6th-8th . If you happen to have attended or visit them, too, welcome to come to meet us at the exhibition. Below is more information about our APE 2024. Exhibition Name: APE 2024 Date: March 6th-8th, 2024 Location: Marina Bay Sands Singapore Ceramitec 2024 Scale: -15,000 M² Visitor: 5000+ Exhibitors: 400+ Innovacera...

Problem solver for foodstuff industries

Visit HEINRICH KIPP from 19 - 22 March 2024 at Anuga FoodTec in Cologne in Hall 8.1, Stand A090. Detectable operating parts The detectable products made of a special plastic can be quickly and reliably located by detection systems. This early detection of foreign bodies plays an important role especially in the foodstuff industry and in critical areas of the pharmace...

28-30 November 2023

SAVE THE DATE! PROTEM & SERCO are proud to attend the famous exhibition WNE 2023 dedicated to the nuclear field of activity. Meet us: Hall 7, Booth 7M074 From 28/11 to 30/11, 9:00 - 18:00 Numerous machines will be shown with live demonstrations. Feel free to schedule a personal meeting with us at contact@protem.fr and give us the date and the time which suit you best...

The 19th Smopyc - Hall 7 Stand 05 - from 22 to 25 November 2023 - the international exhibition of machinery for public works, construction and mining.

What you will find at our stand You will find our portable boring machine, a smart solution for line boring and overlay welding directly on site. We will exhibit the most successful models of the Supercombinata series. You will find the Supercombinata SC1, the portable line boring machine that has made our company a worldwide success. It is suitable for carrying out in...

October 25th – 26th, 2023

We are thrilled to announce that TotalEnergies will be attending the highly anticipated Aluminum USA in Nashville, Tennessee on October 25th – 26th! As a global leader in energy solutions, we are excited to showcase our cutting-edge offerings and demonstrate our commitment to driving innovation in the aluminum industry. Compact, highly adaptable clamping elements and sensor technology

Laubach, July 18, 2023. ROEMHELD will present solutions and components for production automation as well as adaptable clamping technology for the flexible set-up of workpieces at the EMO trade fair in Hanover, Germany. The new, small version of the electric swing clamp and the tried and tested hydraulic swing clamps are extremely compact and now available for the first ...

A digital knowledge package

Adhesive bonding is a demanding joining technology. To successfully solve bonding challenges, you need a good understanding of the basics and special features of this technology. Build up valuable knowledge with the help of our "TECH TALK" webinars! New technologies can push the boundaries of your innovations to unknown limits. In this webinar, you’ll learn more about A...

A digital knowledge package

Adhesive bonding is a demanding joining technology. To successfully solve bonding challenges, you need a good understanding of the basics and special features of this technology. Build up valuable knowledge with the help of our "TECH TALK" webinars! Why should you care about surface pretreatment? Because the right pretreatment can be critical for stronger, more durable ...

Hutchinson was present at the world’s largest industrial and technological exhibition

Hutchinson was present at the world’s largest industrial and technological exhibition, the Hannover Fair, in Germany from April 17 to 21, 2023. Our teams exhibited our sealing, measurement and detection, insulation and transmission belts solutions! HANNOVER MESSE, in brief: 2.500 exhibitors More than 66,400 participants Visitors and exhibitors from around the world

June 8th to June 14th 2023

From June 8 to 14, come and meet our teams at the largest gathering dedicated to textile and garment processing technologies. This event will take place at Fiera Milano RHO, Milan, Italy. Our experts will present our textile lubricants and general maintenance lubricants solutions for all your needs in the textile production chain. Don't miss the opportunity to meet our...

Chavesbao's commercial team will attend the next edition of the Intersolar Europe 2023 fair, a world reference for the solar industry, which will be held from the 14th to the 16th of June in Munich, Germany. You can find us in hall A4, stand 331.

We will be present at this international meeting to offer solutions in DIN and ISO standardised fasteners for the installation of solar panel structures. We have a wide range of screws, nuts, washers and threaded rods, both in stainless steel and carbon steel, which, together with our special coating service, allows us to cover the most demanding needs of the solar secto...

OilDoc Conference & Exhibition 2023

We look forward to meeting you at the next OilDoc conference, the trend-setting event in the fields of lubrication, maintenance, and condition monitoring. And on this occasion, TotalEnergies will be hosting a conference on a topic we'll let you discover on the day! The event will be held in Rosenheim, Germany from May 9 to 11, 2023. Come and meet us at booth 46!

The world’s only global mine electrification event

TotalEnergies will be present at The Electric Mine 2023 & we will be showcasing our brand new range of EV fluid for the mining industry: Rubia EV ! The event will run over for three full days in Tucson, Arizona, from the 23rd to the 25th of May! Come and meet us at booth 33 in Canyon II-IV! On the second day, David KUPIEC, head of performance fluids at TotalEnergies, w...

KOHLSCHEIN presents new materials as exhibitor at FESPA 2023 in Munich from 23.05. to 26.05.2023

The German-based manufacturer of environmentally friendly paper boards and distributor of other rigid media in Germany and Switzerland is exhibiting at FESPA again this year. From 23rd to 26th May 2023, the company will present its new highlights and the large product range. In addition to bestsellers such as KROMA® Displayboard, KROMA® All Black, KROMA® Kraft etc. v...

Mobile or stationary, for production and workshops, electric or manual - optionally with load balancing.

Laubach, April 19, 2023. ROEMHELD is presenting three innovations for the assembly and repair of bicycles, e-bikes and cargo bikes at the Eurobike 2023. The mobile assembly device "Bike ProMobil", the new repair and maintenance device "Bike ProStand" and the compact and energy self-sufficient "Bike BasicLift" can be seen for the first time. Come visit us at booth 6B268 hall 6.

Just a few days to go before the important international Advanced Factories trade fair in Barcelona, where Spain's leading industrial manufacturers will meet. We renew our invitation to visit us at our booth, where you can test and discover the many advantages of our industrial tightening solutions and all the latest semiautomatic and automatic solutions with innovativ...

VINCO, a leading supplier of strip and wire with a strong presence in more than 60 countries, would like to sincerely thank all those who attended the Global Industrie trade fair for their visit.

“We appreciate the time you took to visit our stand and learn about our solutions tailored to each production chain and supply need. We are confident that this exhibition has contributed to improve our understanding of the current industrial situation and to develop better solutions for the contemporary challenges faced by industrial players.” Gilles De Keukelaere, Expo...

Minimal quantity lubrication for the metalworking industry

For the first time DropsA will participate at LAMIERA, the international exhibition dedicated to manufacturing industry that will be held in Bologna from May 10th-13st.
